strapiPost.title: Smell The Autumn Breeze At The Little Candle Of NWA
strapiPost.topic: Sponsored by The Little Candle of NWA
strapiPost.content:
Get a whiff of the fall fragrance collection at The Little Candle of NWA, a local candle maker in Downtown Rogers that offers a rotating collection of soy wax candles. 

  • Handcrafted: Candles are all poured in house in the storefront at 112 N 3rd St. with high-quality clean fragrances and essential oils free of harmful chemicals.
  • Local scents: Apart from their rotating seasonal scents, The Little Candle has an awesome NWA Collection with aromas inspired by different destinations around NWA. 

Follow on social for updates about candle workshops and private events HERE.
